He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha(n)

programme.title: Close Range
programme.desc: Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins as a former soldier forced to protect his family from corrupt cops and drug cartel thugs. With Caitlin Keats, Nick Chinlund and Tony Perez

programme.title: Backtrack
programme.desc: A psychotherapist troubled by strange delusions and recurring nightmares discovers a terrifying secret shared by his patients. The revelation sends him fleeing back to his home town, where he tries to solve a decades-old mystery in the hope that the answer will hold the key to his own issues. Supernatural thriller, starring Adrien Brody and Sam Neill

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: A DJ has a one-night stand with an obsessive woman who repeatedly calls his station with the same song request. When he revives his relationship with an old flame, his unstable fan is driven mad with jealousy. Psychological thriller, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, with Jessica Walter, Donna Mills, John Larch and James McEachin

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster

programme.title: Extraction
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is kidnapped by a terrorist organisation. His son, a government analyst turned down for field service, defies his superiors to mount his own rescue mission. He finds himself battling international assassins and top secret agents to save his father and prevent a terror attack. Action thriller, starring Kellan Lutz, Bruce Willis and Gina Carano

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Headstrong cop Martin Riggs and his cautious partner Roger Murtaugh stumble across a plot by a South African diplomat to launder drugs money by shipping gold coins into the US via his embassy. Protected by diplomatic immunity, the crook looks certain to evade the law - while his chief henchman has a connection to Riggs' traumatic past. Action thriller sequel, with Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Joss Ackland, Derrick O'Connor and Patsy Kensit

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts

programme.title: Dark Places
programme.desc: A seven-year-old girl witnesses the murder of her mother and sisters, and testifies that her teenage brother was the killer, leading to his imprisonment. As an adult, she attends a gathering of true-crime fans, and discovers they all think her brother was innocent. She reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime, and begins to realise her memories may not be as reliable as she thought. Mystery, starring Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Wild Horses
programme.desc: A detective reopens a fifteen-year-old missing persons investigation and the clues lead her to suspect that the missing boy was murdered and his death is linked to a local rancher. Drama, starring Luciana Duvall, Robert Duvall and James Franco

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts

programme.title: Extraction
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is kidnapped by a terrorist organisation. His son, a government analyst turned down for field service, defies his superiors to mount his own rescue mission. He finds himself battling international assassins and top secret agents to save his father and prevent a terror attack. Action thriller, starring Kellan Lutz, Bruce Willis and Gina Carano

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: An unstable Vietnam veteran cop teams up with a by-the-book Los Angeles police detective to investigate the apparent suicide of the daughter of a wealthy businessman, leading them to a violent and bloody confrontation with a ruthless drug cartel under the control of a retired US general. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan and Tom Atkins

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Headstrong cop Martin Riggs and his cautious partner Roger Murtaugh stumble across a plot by a South African diplomat to launder drugs money by shipping gold coins into the US via his embassy. Protected by diplomatic immunity, the crook looks certain to evade the law - while his chief henchman has a connection to Riggs' traumatic past. Action thriller sequel, with Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Joss Ackland, Derrick O'Connor and Patsy Kensit

programme.title: Manson
programme.desc: Biopic of the cult leader, following the establishment of his `family' of followers in 1960s California. Manson exerts a powerful influence over the people who came to him, and fuelled by delusions of an inevitable coming race war, he ultimately compelled them to commit a series of brutal murders on his behalf. Starring Ryan Kiser and Reid Warner

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: Road to Paloma
programme.desc: After avenging his mother's murder, a Native American flees across the desolate American West on his motorbike and attempts to scatter the late woman's ashes. Drama, directed by and starring Jason Momoa, with Sarah Shahi and Lisa Bonet

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Careful What You Wish For
programme.desc: A teenager gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker, as a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal. Thriller, starring Nick Jonas, Dermot Mulroney and Isabel Lucas

programme.title: The Maid's Room
programme.desc: A Colombian immigrant hired as a live-in maid at a luxurious summer house in Long Island witnesses something she shouldn't. Thriller, starring Paula Garces, Annabella Sciorra and Bill Camp

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace

programme.title: 10 Cent Pistol
programme.desc: A pair of low-life criminal brothers target the powerful LA mobster who left one of them rotting in prison. Crime caper, starring Jena Malone and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini(n)

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: A politician's idealistic attitude to his career is contrasted by a disastrous personal life. He is forced to rethink his priorities when a sex scandal brings his reputation into disrepute in the aftermath of a catastrophic oil spill. Drama, starring Nicolas Cage, Sarah Paulson, Connie Nielsen and Peter Fonda(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet(n)

programme.title: Pay the Ghost
programme.desc: A professor's son vanishes without trace during a Halloween carnival. One year later, the academic becomes determined to solve the mystery of the boy's disappearance, but his search for answers leads him to encounter dangerous paranormal forces. Supernatural thriller based on a short story by Tim Lebbon, starring Nicolas Cage and Sarah Wayne Callies(n)

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A detective is determined to bring his dead partner's killers to justice, despite warnings from both his superior officers and the murdered man's wife to forget about it. As he delves deeper, he uncovers dangerous secrets and evidence of political corruption, with a devoutly religious woman seemingly the key to the mystery. Crime thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Ana de Armas and Mira Sorvino(n)

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role(n)

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: A suicidal artist drives into the desert seeking solitude, hoping to find some meaning in his shallow life. He meets a mysterious drifter who throws his life off course, and must find a way to conquer his depression in order to protect the things he cares about. Thriller, starring Oscar Isaac, Garrett Hedlund and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle(n)

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: Biopic of boxer Jake LaMotta, who rose to fame as the world middleweight champion in the 1940s. His career was marred by an inability to deal with his anger, leaving his family bearing the brunt of his rage and paranoia. Directed by Martin Scorsese and starring an Oscar-winning Robert De Niro alongside Joe Pesci and Cathy Moriarty

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Ageing outlaws, bound by a private code of honour and friendship, find themselves at odds with early 20th-century society, and come to realise their era has passed. Hired to steal guns for a tyrannical Mexican general, they instead decide to turn against him. Sam Peckinpah's Western, starring William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Warren Oates, Strother Martin and Edmond O'Brien

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Reds
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fact-based drama, based on the life of American journalist and activist John Reed, famous for his first-hand account of the 1917 Russian Revolution. The film focuses on his relationship with writer Louise Bryant, whom he first encounters at a meeting for radical thinkers. Leaving her husband, she joins Reed on his journey to Russia as the Bolshevik uprising gets under way. Directed by and starring Warren Beatty. With Diane Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Edward Herrmann

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine

programme.title: Junction 48
programme.desc: Premiere. An aspiring Palestinian rapper struggles to find his voice in the face of family tragedy and simmering Arab-Israeli tensions. Israeli drama, starring Tamer Nafar, Samar Qupty and Salwa Nakkara. In Arabic and Hebrew

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton

programme.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the near future, humanoid apes are used as slave labour by brutal humans. An intelligent chimpanzee, the son of two apes from a further distance in time, conceals his ability to speak and lives under the protection of a kindly circus master. But when he is exposed, he leads his fellow simians in a violent uprising. Sci-fi drama, presenting an origin story for the original movie, starring Roddy McDowall and Ricardo Montalban

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: A jaded computer programmer goes to bizarre lengths to get fired from his dull job - but his new laid-back attitude leads to unexpected promotions as his arrogance is taken for supreme self-confidence by unwitting bosses. Satirical comedy, starring Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston, Ajay Naidu and Gary Cole

programme.title: The Thin Red Line
programme.desc: The personal stories of American soldiers sent to fight on the Pacific island of Guadalcanal during the Second World War. The men, among them a former deserter, are forced to confront their fears and beliefs during a bitter conflict for control of a key airfield. Terrence Malick's Second World War drama, adapted from James Jones' 1962 novel. Starring Sean Penn, Ben Chaplin, Nick Nolte, Jim Caviezel and Woody Harrelson

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Two mismatched FBI agents, one a tough former sheriff, the other a by-the-book idealist, are sent to a small town in the Deep South to investigate the disappearance of three civil rights activists, only to come up against a conspiracy of silence. Alan Parker's drama set in the 1960s, starring Gene Hackman, Willem Dafoe, Brad Dourif, Michael Rooker, R Lee Ermey and Frances McDormand

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family, but finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a girl dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Zoom
programme.desc: The lives of an aspiring novelist, an artist and a film director collide in unexpected ways. Reality-bending comedy, starring Alison Pill, Gael Garcia Bernal and Mariana Ximenes

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith

programme.title: Hungry Hearts
programme.desc: A young mother becomes irrationally and dangerously fixated with her baby's health. Psychological drama, starring Adam Driver, Alba Rohrwacher and Roberta Maxwell

programme.title: Iona
programme.desc: A woman fleeing the aftermath of a violent crime seeks refuge on the Scottish island where she grew up, bringing her teenage son with her. Her return has serious ramifications for the friends she left behind, while the boy grows to understand a simpler way of life than he is used to and discovers why his mother rebelled against it. Drama, starring Ruth Negga and Douglas Henshall

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: African slaves seize control of the vessel transporting them to Spain in 1839. Two surviving Spanish crewmen steer the ship to America, where the slaves are imprisoned for killing their captors - but an abolitionist lawyer argues the case for granting them their freedom. Steven Spielberg's historical drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman, Matthew McConaughey, Djimon Hounsou, Nigel Hawthorne and Pete Postlethwaite

programme.title: The White Ribbon
programme.desc: A village in Germany is plagued by strange events in the months leading up to the First World War, as a series of accidents leads on to mysterious acts of vandalism and people being attacked by unknown assailants. As the villagers try to cope with their bad fortune, secrets start to come to light. Michael Haneke's Palme d'Or-winning mystery, starring Christian Friedel and Leonie Benesch. In German, Italian and Polish

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: The students of a Texas high-school enjoy the last day of term in 1976, spending their time in pursuit of sex, drink or drugs. Meanwhile, the newly arrived freshmen are put through a series of humiliating initiation pranks. Richard Linklater's comedy drama, starring Ben Affleck, Milla Jovovich, Matthew McConaughey and Parker Posey

programme.title: Babel
programme.desc: An American couple visit Morocco, but when one of them is accidentally shot, an international crisis ensues. Their Mexican maid, who was left to look after the children back home, encounters difficulty recrossing the border following her son's wedding, while in Tokyo, a deaf mute girl, whose father has a connection to the man responsible for the shooting, struggles to cope with her mother's suicide. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett and Gael Garcia Bernal

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance(n)

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans(n)

programme.title: Valley of Love
programme.desc: An estranged couple meet for the first time in years in Death Valley, California, having responded to a message left for them by their dead son, who committed suicide six months previously. They are instructed to visit a series of locations in the desert, with the promise that their son's ghost will appear to them. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert and Gerard Depardieu. In French and English(n)

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton(n)

programme.title: Up for Love
programme.desc: A diminutive architect woos a beautiful lawyer over the phone, but it remains to be seen whether his stature will prove a stumbling block. French romantic comedy, starring Jean Dujardin, Virginie Efira and Cedric Kahn(n)

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A youngster growing up in a town inhabited only by boys and women makes a strange discovery in the ocean that leaves him convinced that secrets are being kept from him. When he is taken to hospital for a series of procedures, he discovers the terrible truth about his home. Sci-fi mystery, starring Max Brebant and Roxane Duran. In French(n)

programme.title: The Brand New Testament
programme.desc: God secretly lives in Brussels, spending his time enacting spiteful punishments on the human race. His rebellious daughter tries to teach him a lesson by sending everyone on Earth a message containing the date of their death. As the world is plunged into chaos, she flees from her furious father - who gains a new insight into his creation. Comedy, starring Pili Groyne, Benoit Poelvoorde and Catherine Deneuve. In French and German(n)

programme.title: Night Fare
programme.desc: When two old friends partying in Paris skip out on a taxi fare they wind up on the wrong side of a manhunt. Thriller, starring Jonathan Howard, Jonathan Demurger and Fanny Valette(n)

programme.title: Things To Come
programme.desc: A high-school philosophy teacher is forced to re-examine her life when her husband leaves her for another woman. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert, Andre Marcon and Roman Kolinka(n)

programme.title: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: An unemployed man struggles to support his wife and son on meagre state benefits, while contending with pointless and humiliating bureaucracy as she searches for a job. He is eventually employed as a firm's head of security, only to discover his new position confronts him with a terrible moral dilemma. Drama, starring Vincent Lindon and Karine de Mirbeck. In French(n)

programme.title: Valley of Love
programme.desc: An estranged couple meet for the first time in years in Death Valley, California, having responded to a message left for them by their dead son, who committed suicide six months previously. They are instructed to visit a series of locations in the desert, with the promise that their son's ghost will appear to them. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert and Gerard Depardieu. In French and English(n)

programme.title: Welcome to New York
programme.desc: A powerful French businessman maintains an empire that influences the fate of nations, while concealing dangerous sexual appetites. During a business trip to New York, he spends the evening with a number of prostitutes, but finds his seemingly invincible status falling apart when he is accused of assault. Drama, starring Gerard Depardieu and Jacqueline Bisset(n)

programme.title: Powder Room
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a series of setbacks is reunited with an old friend from college, who is now a successful businesswoman living in Paris. During an evening at a nightclub, she begins spinning a web of lies to make her life seem more impressive - but her efforts are ruined by the arrival of her rowdy mates. Comedy, starring Sheridan Smith, Kate Nash, Jaime Winstone and Oona Chaplin

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: A prominent Victorian gentleman thinks he has got away with poisoning his wife, but his shrewd maid knows the sordid truth and uses it to blackmail him. As the killer's social standing improves, he realises he has to get rid of the scheming servant once and for all, but his plans to dispose of her lead him into even more danger. Period thriller, with Stewart Granger, Jean Simmons and Bill Travers

programme.title: The Charge of the Light Brigade
programme.desc: Historical drama set during the Crimean War, in which British military commanders order a disastrous attack on Russian gun positions, causing the needless slaughter of hundreds of cavalrymen. Starring David Hemmings, Vanessa Redgrave, John Gielgud, Trevor Howard and Harry Andrews

programme.title: Tomahawk
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jim Bridger doesn't approve when a gold rush leads the US army to build a fort on land occupied by the Sioux. The situation goes from bad to worse when a sadistic officer launches an unprovoked attack, prompting a vengeful tribe to go on the offensive and leaving Bridger the only one who can save the soldiers at the fort from certain death. Western, starring Van Heflin, Yvonne de Carlo and Alex Nicol, and featuring an early appearance by Rock Hudson

programme.title: Carry On Spying
programme.desc: A secret formula is stolen by a sinister organisation masterminded by the evil Dr Crow. The British government plans to assign its top agents to deal with the crisis, but owing to staff shortages, has to settle for a bungling spy and his three hapless trainees. Comedy, starring Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Barbara Windsor, Bernard Cribbins, Jim Dale, Eric Barker and Victor Maddern

programme.title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A girl grows up in 16th-century Europe under the iron fist of her stepmother, until the love of handsome Prince Henry offers a glimmer of hope. Unfortunately, the royal gent has worries of his own in the shape of an arranged marriage. Luckily, Renaissance genius Leonardo da Vinci is on hand to play fairy godfather and bring the pair together. Romantic drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott and Timothy West

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A scientist carries out genetic experiments on apes, hoping to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease. A chimpanzee used in the tests develops superior intelligence and becomes outraged at the human race's cruel treatment of his kind, forming his fellow primates into an army to overthrow mankind. Sci-fi thriller, starring James Franco, Freida Pinto and Andy Serkis

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: Two amateur film-makers visit the town near the woods that are supposedly home to Bigfoot. They intend to make a documentary about the locals and their monster-inspired tourist trade, but cannot resist trekking into the forest in the hope of proving the creature exists - a quest with terrifying consequences. Horror, starring Alexie Gilmore and Bryce Johnson

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: A reporter survives an ecological catastrophe that struck a coastal town, killing hundreds of people in just 24 hours. The authorities have covered up the cause of the disaster, so she gathers together all the video footage in existence from that fateful day on a mission to expose the truth. Thriller, starring Kether Donohue and Kristen Connolly

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: A drifter rides into a town dominated by the members of a ruthless family. He befriends a Mexican in jail for killing a man who attacked his sister and tries to save him from the gallows, getting caught up in the evil clan's running internal conflicts in the process. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Craig Stevens, Manuel Rojas and Barry Kelley

programme.title: Arabian Nights
programme.desc: The story of two half-brothers - one the heroic caliph, the other an evil usurper - as they do battle for the right to rule their kingdom, and win the hand of beautiful dancer Sherazade. Adaptation of the classic adventure tales, starring Jon Hall, Maria Montez, Sabu and Leif Erickson

programme.title: Santa Fe
programme.desc: A former Confederate soldier takes a job building the Santa Fe railroad after the end of the Civil War and tries to persuade his three brothers to join him, fearing they will otherwise fall into a life of crime owing to their enduring hatred of the North. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Jerome Courtland, Janis Carter and Peter Thompson

programme.title: Down to the Sea in Ships
programme.desc: Sea captain Bering Joy takes his grandson Jed on a whaling trip to teach him about life's challenges and truths, while first mate Dan Lunceford's assignment to look after the lad has dramatic consequences on a voyage packed with incident and danger. Seafaring adventure, starring Lionel Barrymore, Richard Widmark, and Dean Stockwell

programme.title: War of the Planet of the Apes Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Matt Reeves and star Andy Serkis talk about making the third film in the series

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Seven English pensioners looking for a fresh start are drawn to an advert for a hotel in the Indian city of Jaipur, and plan to spend their retirement there. They arrive to find the building dilapidated but are won over by the enthusiastic young manager, and each embarks on their own adventures in the city. Comedy drama, starring Judi Dench, Bill Nighy, Maggie Smith and Dev Patel

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A colony of super-intelligent apes thrives following a global virus outbreak that wipes out much of the human race. A survivor tries to make peace with the leader of the apes, but their efforts to reach an understanding are threatened by warmongers on both sides. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks rob an illegal poker game run by the Mob. A hitman is sent to resolve the situation by either tracking down the culprits or making an example of the gangster who organised the game, but his decision to involve a washed-up old friend threatens the assignment. Crime thriller, starring Brad Pitt, James Gandolfini and Ray Liotta

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Five teenagers united by an obsession with celebrity steal from the houses of the rich and famous stars they idolise, using the internet to follow their targets' movements. When the police finally catch up with them, the arrest brings a taste of the fame they have craved. Fact-based drama, starring Emma Watson and Israel Broussard(n)

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: A medieval castle in Germany is turned into a PoW camp during the Second World War, and used to house the most rebellious Allied prisoners, all of whom have made repeated escape attempts. Although breaking out is supposedly impossible, the determined inmates refuse to be beaten and continue their bid for freedom. Second World War drama, starring John Mills and Eric Portman(n)

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: The inmates of a German PoW camp are convinced there is a traitor in their midst when the guards seem to be forewarned of their escape attempts. An unassuming sergeant content to remain a captive until the end of the conflict becomes the focus of suspicion as mob mentality takes hold. Billy Wilder's Second World War drama, starring an Oscar-winning William Holden, with Don Taylor, Otto Preminger and Harvey Lembeck(n)

programme.title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
programme.desc: An American space mission to Venus brings back a bizarre reptilian creature from the planet's surface, but once exposed to Earth's atmosphere it suddenly begins to grow at an alarming rate and wreaks havoc on the streets of Rome. Sci-fi thriller, starring William Hopper, Joan Taylor and Frank Puglia, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen(n)

programme.title: The Man from Laramie
programme.desc: A cavalry officer determines to avenge the death of his brother, but rather than target the Apaches who killed him, he vows to go after the gang who supplied them with their weapons - leading to conflict with the sadistic son of an elderly rancher. Anthony Mann's Western, starring James Stewart, Arthur Kennedy, Donald Crisp and Cathy O'Donnell(n)

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A privately funded spaceship with an international crew is sent to investigate the potential of Jupiter's fourth largest moon to support life, but technical glitches and human error plunge the astronauts into extreme danger. Found footage sci-fi thriller, starring Daniel Wu, Sharlto Copley and Michael Nyqvist(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An underworld courier lives by a simple code - to never ask what he is transporting. However, when he discovers his latest cargo is alive, his conscience gets the better of him and he faces a dangerous game of cat and mouse with his unknown but powerful employers. Action adventure, starring Jason Statham, Shu Qi, Matt Schulze and Francois Berleand(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children decide to treat the community to a play, but Nellie ends up with all the best lines

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A boy whose father was a Native American warrior faces prejudice from his own grandfather, so the locals step in to help. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan is given the chance to return to Heaven if he completes one last assignment - persuading a film star's bitter daughter not to publish a scathing article about her mother

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help out at a home for former patients in a mental hospital who have been released before their treatment was complete

programme.title: Charlie & Me
programme.desc: An old man has a very close relationship with his 12-year-old granddaughter. When he falls ill, he realises he may not live much longer, and decides to teach her everything he knows while he still can. However, he finds she has just as much to teach him about living his life to the full. Family drama, with Tom Bosley and Jordy Benattar

programme.title: A Walton Thanksgiving Reunion
programme.desc: The family battles a host of personal and romantic problems at a gathering in celebration of Thanksgiving, but also takes advantage of the holiday as an ideal chance to draw strength from one another. Drama based on the TV series, starring Richard Thomas, Ralph Waite, Michael Learned and Ellen Corby

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia responds to distressing news about the war by painting a local beauty spot so it will never be forgotten

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert and Laura try to scare a bully into behaving by convincing him there's a werewolf on the loose. Their plan fails miserably, but prompts the rest of the schoolchildren to make a stand against the playground tyrant

programme.title: Love Takes Wing
programme.desc: A doctor takes up a new position in a small frontier town, where a mysterious illness is afflicting the residents. The medic takes desperate measures to stop the infection spreading, but also has to convince suspicious townsfolk that a local orphanage is not the source of the disease. Drama, starring Sarah Jones, Haylie Duff, Patrick Duffy and Cloris Leachman

programme.title: Love's Unfolding Dream
programme.desc: A woman in 19th-century America aspires to be a doctor and her dreams seem to come true when she nurses a wealthy socialite who offers to pay for her to enrol at medical school. However, an unexpected encounter with a handsome lawyer forces her to reconsider what she really wants. Period drama, starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Nancy Linehan Charles and Patrick Levis

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Secrets
programme.desc: The cast of a glossy American TV series' steamy on-screen relationships pale in comparison with their behind-the-scenes antics. Drama, starring Stephanie Beacham, Christopher Plummer, Linda Purl, Gary Collins and Ben Browder

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: First of a two-part drama by Broadchurch writer Chris Chibnall telling the story of the most infamous heist in British history, beginning with the planning and execution of the crime from the perspective of the perpetrators themselves. After a robbery at Heathrow Airport in 1962, Bruce Reynolds sets his sights on another target - the plan being to rob the overnight mail train from Glasgow to Euston. A team is assembled, schemes are laid out and rehearsals begin. But despite their meticulous planning, the operation is compromised by an attack on the train driver and a botched getaway. Before long, the gang have become the most wanted men in Britain. Luke Evans, Paul Anderson, Martin Compston, Jack Roth and Neil Maskell star

programme.title: The Grim Sleeper
programme.desc: A journalist investigates a series of murders and discovers unusual similarities with other unsolved killings from years previously. She is unable to convince the police of her theory, but sets out to prove that all the murders are the work of one man - finding an ally in the only woman to escape him. Fact-based crime drama, starring Dreama Walker and Macy Gray

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen is attracted to a paratrooper who brings home some mementos of Curt, and Corabeth learns an old flame is anxious to see her(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim-Bob graduates from high school just as the Allied Forces invade France. He joins his three brothers as all of them march off for duty overseas. Erin learns Ashley has got married in London(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: To Live with Fear - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary is diagnosed with a lethal disease, leaving Charles struggling to raise the cash to pay for medical treatment(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: To Live with Fear - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles puts his life in danger and loses the respect of his best friend while struggling to raise money for his daughter's surgery, and Mr Edwards is less than pleased with his last piece of work(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Secrets
programme.desc: The cast of a glossy American TV series' steamy on-screen relationships pale in comparison with their behind-the-scenes antics. Drama, starring Stephanie Beacham, Christopher Plummer, Linda Purl, Gary Collins and Ben Browder(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Vietnam veteran Joe Mason tries to get government assistance with expensive dental work. However, because his condition is not related to his military service, he is denied, leaving him struggling to raise the money(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Ronald James, a respected reporter and anti-drug advocate, is shocked to come home and find out that his son has turned him into the police for cocaine addiction(n)

programme.title: Safe Harbor
programme.desc: A retired couple preparing to embark on a round-the-world sailing trip find themselves looking after a group of troubled teenage boys. The arrangement changes from short term to several months, but the experience proves a rewarding one for them and the kids, inspiring the couple to set up their own foster home. Drama, starring Treat Williams and Nancy Travis(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day on Walton's Mountain
programme.desc: Three mothers cope with the trials of parenthood, while Mary Ellen comes to terms with the news that she will never be able to have any more children. Drama based on the TV series, starring Judy Norton-Taylor, Ralph Waite and Michael Learned(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob befriends a boy who shares his love of flying, and they both fantasise about being pilots. However, reality brings them down to Earth with a bump(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Whatever Happened to the Class of '56?.
programme.desc: The Ingalls attend a farmers' convention where they bump into several old friends. While Charles tries to persuade the smaller landowners to stand up to their considerably bigger rivals, Caroline is surprised to discover how few of her former acquaintances are happy with their lives. Michael Landon and Karen Grassle star(n)

programme.title: Love Finds a Home
programme.desc: A female doctor in a small 19th-century town looks after a friend in the last stages of pregnancy, but finds herself continually at odds with her patient's mother-in-law, who believes in homeopathic treatments. The doctor also has to contend with her daughter's first love and her own inability to conceive. Period drama sequel, based on Janette Oke's novel, starring Sarah Jones and Haylie Duff(n)

programme.title: Love Comes Softly
programme.desc: A widow enters into a temporary marriage of convenience, a practical arrangement to help a recently bereaved father care for his young daughter. However, when the time comes for her to leave, she realises circumstances and people have changed. Romantic drama set in 19th-century America, starring Katherine Heigl, Dale Midkiff, and Skye McCole Bartusiak(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Star
programme.desc: A woman dreams of escaping the drudgery of everyday life and becoming a successful singer. A romance with a handsome stranger offers her hope - but the lovebirds are soon separated, and her spirits take another battering. Romantic drama, starring Jennie Garth, Craig Bierko, Terry Farrell and Ted Wass(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: The police wake to the news of a robbery, but the full extent of the crime and its haul - £2.6million - only becomes evident over the following days. It's clear the local CID is ill-equipped to solve a case of such magnitude, so Scotland Yard is called in, with a six-strong team of detectives headed by the Flying Squad's enigmatic chief Tommy Butler. In a race against time, they set out to identify every criminal involved and bring them to justice before they flee the country - but even if they can, will they find the money? Jim Broadbent stars in the concluding part of the drama about the most infamous heist in British history, with George Costigan, Robert Glenister, Tim Pigott-Smith, Nick Moran and John Salthouse. Written by Broadchurch creator Chris Chibnall(n)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Amy, a nurse and single mother, is devastated when her daughter Emily goes missing. Worse still, she soon receives a phone call from a kidnapper, who claims she must kill a recently admitted patient at her hospital - in exchange for her daughter's life. Thriller, starring Molly Parker(n)

programme.title: The Return
programme.desc: Goldie pitches an idea at her weekly poker game, which Eli believes he can sell. Nick returns after a long and mysterious hiatus, causing friction between Cassie and Bill. Adam starts a new handyman job and quickly learns there's more to the gig than was promised. A visit from Ralph's Vietnam buddy forces him to confront things better left buried

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: A high-profile slaying becomes the case of an ambitious attorney's career. Martin Vail (Richard Gere) is a famed defense lawyer who volunteers his services to Aaron Stampler (Edward Norton), a Kentucky teenager charged with the murder of a Chicago archbishop. Vail's case becomes more complicated than expected when a psychologist concludes that Stampler suffers from multiple personality disorder. Now the cynical, opportunistic attorney is faced with a daunting prospect, a client who may actually deserve his best defense

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: A thuggish group of privileged LA teenagers kidnap the younger brother of a junkie who refuses to pay his drug debt and take the kid to Palm Springs. Stars Justin Timberlake and Bruce Willis

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: To Catch A Thief
programme.desc: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence. Cary Grant and Grace Kelly star in this classic Alfred Hitchcock thriller

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: A housewife befriends an old lady in a nursing home and becomes enthralled by the tales she tells of a unique relationship between two women in 1930s Alabama. Academy Award winners Kathy Bates and Jessica Tandy star

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: Four best friends decide to recreate the greatest adventure of their lives, and walk the entire length of Manhattan in one last attempt to find the love and adventure from their glory days. Stars Adam Brody and Josh Lawson

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Sam (Chris Pine) is a twenty-something, fast-talking salesman whose latest deal collapses the day he learns his father has suddenly died. Against his wishes, Sam is called home to put his father's estate in order and reconnect with his estranged family. While there, he uncovers a startling secret that turns his entire world upside down - he has a 30-year-old sister (Elizabeth Banks) he never knew existed. Michelle Pfeiffer and Oliva Wilde co-star in this smart and witty drama

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: It's the last day of high school before summer vacation somewhere in middle America - 1976. The story follows the conflicts faced by Randy "Pink" Floyd, Mitch Kramer, Sabrina, Slater, Mike, and Wooderson. When the day dawns on the football field where several of them have gathered, the future might look bleak, but not totally without hope. Like it or not, the forced environment and resultant camaraderie that school has created for them is the closest thing they've known to home during these "best years" of their lives

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Marcia Gay Harden stars as a librarian who travels to Costa Rica to escape her mid-life crisis and finds herself on an unexpected journey filled with adventure and romance

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)

programme.title: Listen To Me Marlon
programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: The Return
programme.desc: Goldie pitches an idea at her weekly poker game, which Eli believes he can sell. Nick returns after a long and mysterious hiatus, causing friction between Cassie and Bill. Adam starts a new handyman job and quickly learns there's more to the gig than was promised. A visit from Ralph's Vietnam buddy forces him to confront things better left buried(n)

programme.title: PART 9
programme.desc: This is the chair(n)

The gigolos compete in a test of intelligence to decide which guy will grace the cover of the new 'Cowboys 4 Angels' calendar. Nick's date challenges his alpha status while Brace becomes the light at the end of his client's tunnel(n)

programme.desc: Ash's life partner comes to town and her visit sparks a debate about the nature of open relationships. Vin turns to the dark side for a client's fantasy(n)

programme.title: Halloween (2007)
programme.desc: Director Rob Zombie reimagines a horror classic with this box office smash that begins anew the story of deranged serial killer Michael Myers (Tyler Mane) and his reign of homicidal wrath over a sleepy, unsuspecting town. Malcolm McDowell, Brad Dourif, William Forsythe, Udo Kier, Dee Wallace, Danny Trejo and Adrienne Barbeau costar in this terrifying remake(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A group of four friends who rent a luxury yacht for a weekend of sun and sailing find themselves in a nightmare scenario when they are left floating in the ocean as their vessel drifts out of reach - with one stranded mother's newborn infant on board alone. Eric Dane, Susan May Pratt, Ali Hillis and Niklaus Lange star in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Casual Sex?
programme.desc: Lea Thompson and Victoria Jackson star in a first-rate sex comedy about two women looking for love at a health resort and confronting the changing sexual attitudes of society. Andrew Dice Clay also stars(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate navigates emotional and cultural land mines when she accepts a position as nanny to the spoiled, bratty child of a demanding, wealthy Manhattan couple in this comedy based on the best-selling novel. Scarlett Johansson, Laura Linney, Paul Giamatti, Chris Evans, Alicia Keys and Nicholas Art star(n)

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). Soon they're embroiled in a complex scheme to steal a priceless relic from a Canadian customs house, but revealed secrets and double-crosses are just around the corner(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: A police captain (Ethan Hawke) must put together a force of cops and criminals to defend the soon-to-close Precinct 13 when they come under attack by a gang intent on freeing their imprisoned boss (Laurence Fishburne)(n)

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Reaper
programme.desc: When a death row inmate survives his execution and returns as a supernatural, unholy creature, a mysterious community of drifters and criminals must band together to defeat the monster or perish in the depths of hell

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: Grace (Nicole Kidman) has been raising her two young children alone in a beautiful, cavernous, Victorian mansion, the one place she believes them to be safe. But they are not safe. Not anymore. Her daughter reveals she has been communicating with unexplained apparitions. At first, Grace is reluctant to believe in her children's frightening sightings, but soon, she too begins to sense that intruders are at large. In order to discover the truth, Grace must abandon all of her fears, and enter the otherworldly heart of the supernatural

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead

programme.desc: An unknown killer, clad in World War II US Army fatigues, stalks a sleepy New Jersey town bent on reliving a 35-year-old double murder, which leads him back to the scene of the crime at the college spring dance

Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power(n)

programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left(n)

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: Documentary following horror fan Tal Zimerman as he travels around the world to understand why people thrive on blood and gore, and meets with the genre's leading filmmakers, writers, actors and psychologists to discover how horror is portrayed in different cultures(n)

programme.desc: Robin Williams is a Cutter, a futuristic editor who shapes the digitally recorded memories of the dead into narratives that can be watched by their bereaved loved ones - but one new batch of memories contains horrible crimes committed by a wealthy and powerful client. Mira Sorvino and James Caviezel costar in this science fiction drama from writer/director Omar Naim(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A couple meet on a Long Island commuter train, are drawn to each other's opposing personalities, and begin a tenuous relationship. Then they discover that they were already lovers for two years in the past, and chose to have their painful relationship erased from their minds by the cutting-edge technology of a company called Lacuna Inc., where the employees are hiding their own secrets from each other and themselves. Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet and Kirsten Dunst star in this acclaimed comedy drama that won an Oscar(R) for Best Original Screenplay(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches

programme.title: The Drew
programme.desc: The incredible story of the unlikely rise of The Drew League from humble beginnings in the crime and gang infested streets of South Central Los Angeles to the nation's foremost pro-am basketball league. Crossing racial, cultural and socioeconomic barriers, The Drew celebrates the value of basketball, persistence, loyalty and above all, community. Featuring NBA stars Kevin Durant, DeMar DeRozan, Brandon Jennings and Baron Davis
