Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: House of D
programme.desc: David Duchovny wrote, directed and costars in this sweet coming-of-age drama starring Anton Yelchin as a 13-year-old boy living in New York's Greenwich Village in 1973, whose best friend is a mentally challenged adult (Robin Williams) and whose romantic mentor in matters of the heart is a female prisoner (Erykah Badu) in the nearby Women's House of Detention. Tea Leoni and Zelda Williams costar

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: House of D
programme.desc: David Duchovny wrote, directed and costars in this sweet coming-of-age drama starring Anton Yelchin as a 13-year-old boy living in New York's Greenwich Village in 1973, whose best friend is a mentally challenged adult (Robin Williams) and whose romantic mentor in matters of the heart is a female prisoner (Erykah Badu) in the nearby Women's House of Detention. Tea Leoni and Zelda Williams costar

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: House of D
programme.desc: David Duchovny wrote, directed and costars in this sweet coming-of-age drama starring Anton Yelchin as a 13-year-old boy living in New York's Greenwich Village in 1973, whose best friend is a mentally challenged adult (Robin Williams) and whose romantic mentor in matters of the heart is a female prisoner (Erykah Badu) in the nearby Women's House of Detention. Tea Leoni and Zelda Williams costar

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches

programme.title: Bravetown
programme.desc: After an accidental drug overdose, a hardened New York teen DJ is sentenced to spend a year with his estranged father in small town North Dakota where he discovers a community of people who need his music to lift them up

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Get The Girl
programme.desc: A wealthy young man is conned into staging a fake kidnapping in order to play the hero and win the affection of a girl he's madly in love with. But when one of the hired hands is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to actually save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her(n)

Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver(n)

programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.title: Friends and Family
programme.desc: In the band's hometown of Denver, a throng of needy friends and family descend upon the crew, including band member Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, who must be kept away from him at all costs(n)

programme.title: Longest Days
programme.desc: Janine's visit continues to shake things up for the Staton-House Band and their crew. Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend(n)

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A couple meet on a Long Island commuter train, are drawn to each other's opposing personalities, and begin a tenuous relationship. Then they discover that they were already lovers for two years in the past, and chose to have their painful relationship erased from their minds by the cutting-edge technology of a company called Lacuna Inc., where the employees are hiding their own secrets from each other and themselves. Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet and Kirsten Dunst star in this acclaimed comedy drama that won an Oscar(R) for Best Original Screenplay

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: The improbably true story of a charismatic conman's journey from small-town businessman to flamboyant white-collar criminal, who repeatedly finds himself on the lam, brilliantly escaping from prison on four separate occasions - all in the name of love. Starring Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor and Leslie Mann

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as a married man whose long-suppressed sexual identity slowly emerges when he picks up a male hooker and pays him for companionship rather than sex, causing his life of predictable normalcy to unravel

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Robin Williams is a Cutter, a futuristic editor who shapes the digitally recorded memories of the dead into narratives that can be watched by their bereaved loved ones - but one new batch of memories contains horrible crimes committed by a wealthy and powerful client. Mira Sorvino and James Caviezel costar in this science fiction drama from writer/director Omar Naim

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate navigates emotional and cultural land mines when she accepts a position as nanny to the spoiled, bratty child of a demanding, wealthy Manhattan couple in this comedy based on the best-selling novel. Scarlett Johansson, Laura Linney, Paul Giamatti, Chris Evans, Alicia Keys and Nicholas Art star

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Leigh delivers another glimpse of British working-class life with a moving, humanistic tale capturing both the desperation and bittersweet humor of its subjects' lives. Phil (Timothy Spall), a scruffy cab driver, his common-law life Penny (Lesley Manville) and their two overweight children reside in one of South London's ubiquitous concrete housing developments. When an unexpected crisis descends upon Phil and Penny, they are forced to face and affirm some of life's timeless verities. "Richly satisfying" ("The Guardian")

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: Hesher
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as in this coming-of-age story as a metal head who unexpectedly enters the life of a grieving family and takes on the unlikely role of helping a 13-year-old boy cope with the death of his mother

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication

programme.title: Permanent Midnight
programme.desc: Ben Stiller gives the performance of a lifetime in this searing, dark-humored drama based on the autobiography by Jerry Stahl. A hardcore heroin addict, Stahl nevertheless finds success as a writer for an insipid network television series and love with a gorgeous movie executive (Elizabeth Hurley), then proceeds to blow it all in the quest to maintain his habit. Owen Wilson costars in this chilling cautionary tale

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: Beat
programme.desc: Kiefer Sutherland stars as writer William S. Burroughs in this biopic set in the early days of the Beat literary movement in New York City. As Burroughs courts the woman who would become his second wife, the pair are drawn into the lives of poets Jack Kerouac and Allen Ginsberg and their world of sex, violence and unbridled creativity. Costars Courtney Love

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly(n)

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between(n)

programme.title: The Poisoned Chalice
programme.desc: In the Season 1 premiere, Rodrigo successfully bribes and intimidates his way into an election as Pope Alexander VI, making him the new leader of the Catholic Church; powerful Cardinals Della Rovere and Orsini oppose his rise; the Borgias recruit a talented assassin named Micheletto to their cause(n)

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: The new Pope wastes no time consolidating power and balancing opposition to him in the College of Cardinals by elevating his children to high office, installing Juan as head of the papal armies and Cesare as a cardinal and his successor, while seeking a politically fortuitous marriage for daughter Lucrezia(n)

programme.title: Scorned
programme.desc: When a woman discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with her best friend, she plans a romantic weekend getaway for just the three of them, complete with terror, torture and twisted psychosexual games. Stars AnnaLynne McCord and Billy Zane(n)

programme.title: Beat
programme.desc: Kiefer Sutherland stars as writer William S. Burroughs in this biopic set in the early days of the Beat literary movement in New York City. As Burroughs courts the woman who would become his second wife, the pair are drawn into the lives of poets Jack Kerouac and Allen Ginsberg and their world of sex, violence and unbridled creativity. Costars Courtney Love(n)

programme.title: Breach

When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.title: Witless Protection
programme.desc: A bumbling deputy (Larry the Cable Guy) mistakes a federal witness for a kidnapping victim and takes her into "protective custody," thereby incurring the wrath of the FBI and a slew of unsavory criminals. Jenny McCarthy costars in this wacky comedy with Peter Stormare, Eric Roberts, Ivana Milicevic, Yaphet Kotto (as the same character he played in "Midnight Run") and Joe Mantegna(n)

programme.title: Bravetown
programme.desc: After an accidental drug overdose, a hardened New York teen DJ is sentenced to spend a year with his estranged father in small town North Dakota where he discovers a community of people who need his music to lift them up(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: Prograis vs. Diaz Jr. (R)
programme.desc: Undefeated southpaw Regis Prograis (19-0, 16 KOs) takes on super lightweight Joel Diaz Jr.(23-0, 19 KOs). REPLAY

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: No No: A Dockumentary
programme.desc: A documentary about infamous no-hitter Dock Ellis who threw for the Pittsburgh Pirates in the 70s and was embroiled in controversy on and off the field, and later become a trailblazer for a new wave of civil rights. Features intimate stories and a trove of archival footage to reveal the man behind the legend

programme.title: The Program
programme.desc: A group of young athletes come together from different worlds in this gritty, action-packed story of Top 10 college football, where talent unites them, competition divides them and their demanding coach stands by them, even when they fall. Stars James Caan and Halle Berry

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Sexipede
programme.desc: A doctor tries to prove an unknown creature materializes inside human bodies during sex by romping with her until she can capture it

programme.title: 11 Blocks
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller about a man whose wife is held hostage by a corrupt police chief and a hired assassin, forcing him to do the impossible: traverse 11 gang-controlled city blocks to save her life

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A group of four friends who rent a luxury yacht for a weekend of sun and sailing find themselves in a nightmare scenario when they are left floating in the ocean as their vessel drifts out of reach - with one stranded mother's newborn infant on board alone. Eric Dane, Susan May Pratt, Ali Hillis and Niklaus Lange star in this taut thriller

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: The Boston Strangler
programme.desc: Crime thriller about a wise cracking, small time criminal with an unrelenting sex drive who concocts a plan with his cellmate to confess to the crimes of the Boston Strangler and gain notoriety and reward money

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape

programme.title: Alonzo Bodden: Historically Incorrect
programme.desc: Alonzo Bodden returns with a comedic look at the historical inaccuracies of the present and past in an all-new stand-up comedy event that exposes the hypocrisy - and hilarity - of modern day culture

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: Kill Kane
programme.desc: A family man seeks revenge when his wife and children are murdered by infamous gangsters. Taking matters into his own hands, he pursues vigilante justice on the streets, hunting down those who robbed him of a future

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Tarver vs. Dawson (R)
programme.desc: America's number-one boxing network delivers epic battles featuring Sam Peter, Rafael Marquez, Antonio Tarver, Chad Dawson and other top contenders. Only SHOWTIME delivers the heart-pounding, action-packed live fights boxing fans crave. No wonder ESPN.com raves, "...if you're a serious fight fan, you must have Showtime!"(n)

programme.title: How to Be a Player
programme.desc: A playboy whose only objective in life seems to be having sex with as many girls as possible without getting caught has the tables turned on him at a party where all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all(n)

programme.title: Scar Tissue
programme.desc: A young man is stalked by a serial killer who supposedly died decades ago(n)

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice(n)

programme.title: Get The Girl
programme.desc: A wealthy young man is conned into staging a fake kidnapping in order to play the hero and win the affection of a girl he's madly in love with. But when one of the hired hands is accidentally killed during the charade, he's forced to actually save her life while not revealing that it's been a ruse all along(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Company Man
programme.desc: In 1961, nerdy schoolteacher Allen Quimp tells his henpecking wife that he's a CIA agent in an effort to get her off his back. She's soon at work on a tell-all biography while he's off to communist Cuba, where he bungles his way into an actual covert operation with a real-life "spook" bent on taking down national leader Fidel Castro. Douglas McGrath, John Turturro and Sigourney Weaver star in this raucous political farce

programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: The Accidental Spy

Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: Permanent Midnight
programme.desc: Ben Stiller gives the performance of a lifetime in this searing, dark-humored drama based on the autobiography by Jerry Stahl. A hardcore heroin addict, Stahl nevertheless finds success as a writer for an insipid network television series and love with a gorgeous movie executive (Elizabeth Hurley), then proceeds to blow it all in the quest to maintain his habit. Owen Wilson costars in this chilling cautionary tale

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent')

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: Psychological drama from director Atom Egoyan ("The Sweet Hereafter") stars Elaine Cassidy as Felicia, an Irish girl who follows her boyfriend to England when she discovers she's pregnant with his child. Unsure of his exact whereabouts, Felicia instead comes under the sway of Joseph (Bob Hoskins), a caterer who has a violent secret history with young homeless women just like Felicia. Based on the novel by William Trevor

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Holy Lesbo Batman
programme.desc: In episode 103, Kirstie schemes to meet Gwen Stefani but instead finds herself in jail with her ex boyfriend who reveals himself to be gay(c)

programme.title: The Koi Effect
programme.desc: In episode 104, Kirstie tries out a new diet theory which proposes that in order to get small, you have to surround yourself with small things(c)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Rabid

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Leigh delivers another glimpse of British working-class life with a moving, humanistic tale capturing both the desperation and bittersweet humor of its subjects' lives. Phil (Timothy Spall), a scruffy cab driver, his common-law life Penny (Lesley Manville) and their two overweight children reside in one of South London's ubiquitous concrete housing developments. When an unexpected crisis descends upon Phil and Penny, they are forced to face and affirm some of life's timeless verities. "Richly satisfying" ("The Guardian")(n)

In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: In 1960s South Carolina, a young white girl and her black caregiver are taken in by an eccentric trio of sisters, in this adaptation of the best seller by Sue Monk Kidd. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mr. Woodcock
programme.desc: A self-help author (Seann William Scott) comes home for a visit and finds his mother (Susan Sarandon) engaged to his sadistic former gym teacher (Billy Bob Thornton) in this crude farce. Amy Poehler, Melissa Sagemiller, Ethan Suplee. Directed by Craig Gillespie. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar winner Julia Roberts as a sassy, low-level law-office worker who becomes obsessed with a case involving a California utility company that's accused of polluting the drinking water in a small town. The real-life Erin Brockovich has a cameo as a waitress named Julia. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: When a space station crew refuses to return home, Dr. Chris Kelvin is sent to find out what's going on. When he arrives, most of crew has disappeared, and Chris is visited by a replica of his late wife who is imbued with her memories. Remake of the acclaimed 1972 film and adapted from Stanislaw Lem's novel. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Slick Hollywood fixer Eddie Mannix is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious group. Mannix races to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match. (cc)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: An inept ABA basketball team that is in danger of folding when the league announces plans to merge with the NBA in 1976. (cc)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision. (cc)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley awakens 57 years later in this sequel to 1979's "Alien," returning to the space colony where she first encountered a hideous, reptilian creature. The film won Oscars for Sound and Visual Effects. (cc)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site 25 years later. Tourists and their guide become unexpectedly stranded in the town of Pripyat, located near the old facility, and realize they are being hunted. Now, the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing to battle unspeakable evil. (cc)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Randall "Memphis" Raines, a retired car thief, is drawn back into action when a crime lord threatens to whack Raines' brother unless the thief steals 50 top-model cars within 72 hours. Raines recruits a crew of fellow carjackers, including an old pro and an old flame, and the race is on. (cc)

programme.title: Austin Powers The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: The series' second entry sends Austin Powers, the international man of mystery, zipping back in time to 1969 with his new sidekick, Felicity Shagwell, where nefarious Dr. Evil has stolen his "mojo," the life force that makes him a swinging ladies' man. (cc)

programme.title: Hitman Agent 47
programme.desc: A mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers. (cc)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In 1820s America, frontiersman Hugh Glass is betrayed and left for dead by his fur-trapping party after he is viciously attacked by a grizzly bear. However, Glass survives and sets out to seek revenge. (cc)

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: A drifter comes to the aid of gold prospectors who are being harassed by a greedy landowner coveting their territory. (cc)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: WWE superstar John Cena stars as Danny Fisher, a New Orleans police detective who must complete a dozen mind-bending puzzles in order to save his beloved fiancée from being murdered by an escaped criminal looking for revenge. Directed by Renny Harlin. (cc)

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Crash landing on a barren penal-colony planet with an unwelcome visitor in tow, Ripley contends with a group of hardened convicts while using nothing but her wits to battle a terrifying new breed of alien. Although her plan to corner and kill the creature just might work, a horrifying discovery reveals that her fight is far from over. (cc)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations. (cc)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan. (cc)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother. (cc)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: The lives of a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (cc)

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: Halle Berry won an Oscar for this wrenching tale about a Southerner who falls for a prison guard (Billy Bob Thornton) following her husband's execution. Buck: Peter Boyle. Sonny: Heath Ledger. Lawrence: Sean Combs. Directed by Marc Forster. (cc)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder, a businessman visiting Japan is targeted by a ruthless clan of ninjas. He teams up with a samurai bent on ending a feud between their clans. (cc)

programme.title: Cabin Boy
programme.desc: Satire about a snobbish student who mistakenly signs onto a ship full of crusty old salts. Bad luck and sometimes fantastical hijinks ensue on the high seas. (cc)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: Shakespeare's "Othello" inspired this drama about a black athlete who wins a scholarship to an all-white school. Although Odin's future seems bright, a jealous friend tries to make the star athlete believe that his girlfriend is cheating on him. (cc)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A buttoned-down career woman agrees to let a loopy working-class girl become the surrogate mother of her child. (cc)

programme.desc: A rock-and-roll detective who floats through the clubs of Hollywood, picking up women and clients, stumbles into a case involving the death of a heavy metal singer. (cc)

programme.title: Jersey Shore

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 6)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 7)
programme.desc: Gretchen i doktor Kaan zbliżają się do siebie. Mimo to kobieta nie potrafi powstrzymać się przed nieustannym porównywaniem się z jego byłą ukochaną. Tłumione kompleksy sprawiają, że może chwilowo zapomnieć o diecie. Na oddział trafia ciężarna zakonnica ze złamaną nogą. Nagle kobieta zaczyna rodzić. Meier w drodze wyjątku wyraża więc zgodę na to, by na chirurgii pomagał doktor Kaan. Barbara zapisuje się na jazdę konną. Dzięki nowemu hobby nie tylko zapomina o samotności, lecz także poznaje przystojnego chirurga plastycznego. Niewierny mąż robi się zazdrosny o jej nowego znajomego

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 8)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 6)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 7)
programme.desc: Gretchen i doktor Kaan zbliżają się do siebie. Mimo to kobieta nie potrafi powstrzymać się przed nieustannym porównywaniem się z jego byłą ukochaną. Tłumione kompleksy sprawiają, że może chwilowo zapomnieć o diecie. Na oddział trafia ciężarna zakonnica ze złamaną nogą. Nagle kobieta zaczyna rodzić. Meier w drodze wyjątku wyraża więc zgodę na to, by na chirurgii pomagał doktor Kaan. Barbara zapisuje się na jazdę konną. Dzięki nowemu hobby nie tylko zapomina o samotności, lecz także poznaje przystojnego chirurga plastycznego. Niewierny mąż robi się zazdrosny o jej nowego znajomego

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 8)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: Rank the Prank - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters are Prank 360 (Zhara and Sara) and Gladiators (Hadrian and Luke) who team up with SFX specialists Marc Reichel and Andy Antoine and stunt performer Devon Slack to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. Today teams invade an office building and for unsuspecting targets, it's going to be anything but another... day at the office! It's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life. But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? It's a battle between the head-scratching 'Office Switcheroo' and the super-charged 'Trainwreck Hallway'! Ranksters ... the choice is yours. For the winning team, Marc, Andy and Devon have planned a MEGA PRANK packed with ninja power! The setting is a martial arts dojo, complete with flying rigs, flying crates and flying people! Will the targets flap their wings and take flight too? One thing's for sure, this MEGA PRANK is gonna be fly!

programme.title: Twin It to Win It
programme.sub-title: Twin It to Win It: Twinbledon: Ball Crew.
programme.desc: The twins' brother Riley thinks that being ball girls could be their golden ticket into Wimbledon and meeting Johanna Konta for some fitness training, they think it could be too. But once they get to ball crew boot camp will they realise it's harder than they first thought? And will they finally learn to take direction by going on the set of the Worst Witch in time for their Wimbledon try out?
